text: Make the sweet and sour sauce. Combine water and sugar. Heat until  sugar is dissolved. Add ketchup and pineapple juice and bring to a full boil.  Thicken with corn starch. Mix in small amount of corn starch and water. Make thick (so adding vinegar will not become too thin).  Add vinegar. Do not boil after adding vinegar. Set aside.  Add pineapple chunks and green pepper just before serving.  Prepare the pork or chicken.  Mix batter ingredients in sufficient proportion to cover pork on all sides.  Add ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) cubed, fat-free meat in bowl when meat is completely covered in sauce, then place individual pieces into deep fat fryer.  Fry to a light brown color. Cover with sweet & sour sauce. Add pineapple & green pepper chunks.  Serve over white rice.
